Entries.Mon8: I'd love to draw a portrait of Haley sometime.$0#$e#She'd be the most beautiful model ever.$4
Entries.Tue8: Hi, @.$1#$e#You know, itâ€™s thanks to you and Haley that I was able to come this far with my art.$0#$e#You should come over and have dinner with us sometime, @.$1#$b#Also, Lainey has so many questions for you.$1
Entries.Wed8: Hey, @.$0#$e#You know, I'd never move back to the city even though it was difficult to leave everything behind.$0#$b#I love living in the valley, and now that we've our little Lainey with us, I have so many plans for the future.$1
Entries.Thu8: I've realised that when I moved here, I wasn't really trying to make new friends because I was still processing all the changes.$0#$b#But, now, I have made some really good friends and have a beautiful wife and daughter.$1
Entries.Fri8: I was afraid that I was rushing too much with Haley...$2#$b#You know that my previous relationship ended pretty badly and I had no plans to be with anybody when I moved here.$2#$b#But then Haley came and ruined my plans.$0#$e#I'm glad she did, I love her so much.$4#$b#I still can't believe she's my wife.$4
Entries.Sat8: My career as an artist was not going very well when I first moved here...$2#$e#Fortunately, Haley has always believed in me.$0#$b#She is really supportive.$1#$e#Lainey also tells me everyday she loves my paintings.$1
Entries.Sun8: Lainey's such a great kid.$0#$b#Haley and I love her so much.$0#$b#I can't believe how happy I am.$1
Entries.spring_Mon8: Hey, @.$1#$e#Haley and I have thought about putting on a joint exhibition.$1#$e#You know, we'd display my sculptures and paintings along with Haley's photographs.$0
Entries.spring_Thu8: Oh, hey, @.$1#$e#Haley wanted me to help her developing some photos.$0#$e#Since we're living together now, we have dinner with Emily when she has to develop photos.$1
Entries.spring_Sat8: An old friend of mine from Zuzu City has told me that he's going to present his first art exhibition next month.$1#$e#I'm going with Haley and Lainey. We're visiting my parents while we're there.$1#$b#Lainey love visiting her grandparents.$1
Entries.summer_Wed8: Haley absolutely loves summer.$0#$b#As soon as we wake up she asks me to go sunbathing with her.$1
Entries.summer_Fri8: On summer days Haley, Lainey and I love to go for a swim.$1#$b#We usually go to the beach, but actually the river could also be a good option.$1
Entries.summer_Sat8: I should take my watercolors with me the next time I go to the beach.$0#$b#I'd like to do some quick sketches of Haley and Lainey playing together.$1
Entries.fall_Mon8: I used to have terrible artistic blocks...$2#$e#But it's better now that I live with Haley, she's my biggest inspiration.$4
Entries.fall_Fri8: I love walking in the forest with Haley and Lainey in the fall.$0#$b#The breeze is very pleasant and they enjoy taking pictures of the river.$1
Entries.fall_Sun8: Hey, @!$1#$e#I bought some wine from Pierre's for the dinner I'm preparing.$1#$b#I also bought Ice Cream for Lainey.$1
Entries.winter_Tue8: On cold days like this it's nice to cuddle with Haley...$4
Entries.winter_Thu8: Haley doesn't like winter much, but Lainey loves playing in the snow.$0#$b#Sometimes you have to sacrifice yourself for your children.$0
Entries.winter_Sat8: This year has been the best in my life so far. Seeing how my art reaches more people, being married to Haley, watching our daughter grow up, having a good relationship with the other townsfolk... What's not to like?$0
Entries.spring_14_2: I've spent the last month painting a picture for Haley's birthday.$0#$b#It's titled 'My Sunflower'.$4
Entries.summer_10_2: Haley is going to bring her camera to the Luau, she's really excited.$1
Entries.summer_20_2: Today is Lainey's birthday.$0#$b#She's growing up really fast!$1
Entries.fall_28_2: Lainey doesn't like the Spirit's Eve, she's really scared of the Haunted Maze...$3
